traits.description: When Marc takes lethal damage from an enemy, he survives the attack and is granted Ressurection, provoking the surrounding enemies for **5** seconds. During Ressurection, Marc cannot perform any actions, does not take damage, recovers **1%** HP every second, and healing received is increased by **20%**. This effect has a cooldown of **10** minutes. Damage from Stinging Eel and Ground Roar is reduced by **50%**.

When Marc takes lethal damage from an enemy, he survives the attack and is granted Ressurection, provoking the surrounding enemies for **5** seconds. During Ressurection, Marc cannot perform any actions, does not take damage, recovers **2%** HP every second, and healing received is increased by **50%**. This effect has a cooldown of **10** minutes. Damage from Stinging Eel and Ground Roar is reduced by **50%**.
